name: Epic.Darkness_Mastery
display_help: You have Mastery over Darkness to control and blast your foes.

powers.name: Epic.Darkness_Mastery.Torrent
powers.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their chance to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Smashing), Foe -To Hit, Knockback

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Darkness_Mastery.Night_Fall
powers.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit. You must be level 41 and have Torrent or Petrifying Gaze before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 20° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Darkness_Mastery.Tenebrous_Tentacles
powers.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. You must be level 44 and have two other Darkness Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)
